00019 #include <qwidget.h>
00020 #include <qlayout.h>
00021 #include <qlabel.h>
00022 
00023 #include "journalSummary.h"
00024 #include "journalTable.h"
00025 #include "journalData.h"
00026 #include "client.h"
00027 
00028 JournalSummary::JournalSummary(QWidget *parent, const char *name, JournalTable *table)
00029     : QWidget(parent,name)
00030 {
00031     journalData = JournalData::instance();
00032     connect(journalData, SIGNAL(journalTmpChanged()), this, SLOT(updateSummary()));
00033 
00034     client = Client::instance();
00035     connect(client, SIGNAL(clientOpened(QString)), this, SLOT(updateSummary()));
00036     
00037     int debitColWidth = 100;
00038     int creditColWidth = 100;
00039     int scrollBarWidth = (table->verticalScrollBar()->width() + 5);
00040     
00041     grid = new QGridLayout(this, 3, 5, 0, -1, "journalSummary::grid");
00042     
00043     debitLabel = new QLabel("Debit:", this, "journalSummary::debitLabel");
00044     debitLabel->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
00045     
00046     debitValue = new QLabel("<tt></tt>", this,
00047                     "journalSummary::debitValue");
00048     debitValue->setFixedWidth(debitColWidth);
00049     debitValue->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
00050     
00051     creditLabel = new QLabel("Credit:", this, "journalSummary::creditLabel");
00052     creditLabel->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
00053     
00054     creditValue = new QLabel("<tt></tt>", this,
00055                     "journalSummary::creditValue");
00056     creditValue->setFixedWidth(creditColWidth);
00057     creditValue->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
00058     
00059     balanceLabel = new QLabel(tr("<b>Out of Balance:</b>"), this,
00060             "journalSummary::balanceLabel");
00061     balanceLabel->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
00062     
00063     balanceValue = new QLabel("<b><tt></tt></b>", this,
00064                     "journalSummary::balanceValue");
00065     balanceValue->setAlignment(Qt::AlignRight);
00066     
00067     debitWidth = new QSpacerItem(debitColWidth, 1);
00068     creditWidth = new QSpacerItem(creditColWidth, 1);
00069     scrollWidth = new QSpacerItem(scrollBarWidth, 1);
00070     
00071     grid->setColStretch(0, 1);
00072     
00073     grid->addWidget(debitLabel, 0, 1);
00074     grid->addWidget(debitValue, 0, 2);
00075     grid->addItem(creditWidth, 0, 3);
00076     
00077     grid->addItem(scrollWidth, 0, 4);
00078     
00079     grid->addWidget(creditLabel, 1, 1);
00080     grid->addItem(debitWidth, 1, 2);
00081     grid->addWidget(creditValue, 1, 3);
00082     
00083     grid->addWidget(balanceLabel, 2, 1);
00084     grid->addItem(debitWidth, 2, 2);
00085     grid->addWidget(balanceValue, 2, 3);
00086     
00087 }
00088 
00089 JournalSummary::~JournalSummary()
00090 {
00091     grid->removeItem(scrollWidth);
00092     delete scrollWidth;
00093     grid->removeItem(creditWidth);
00094     delete creditWidth;
00095     grid->removeItem(debitWidth);
00096     delete debitWidth;
00097     grid->remove(balanceValue);
00098     delete balanceValue;
00099     grid->remove(balanceLabel);
00100     delete balanceLabel;
00101     grid->remove(creditValue);
00102     delete creditValue;
00103     grid->remove(creditLabel);
00104     delete creditLabel;
00105     grid->remove(debitValue);
00106     delete debitValue;
00107     grid->remove(debitLabel);
00108     delete debitLabel;
00109     delete grid;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void JournalSummary::updateSummary()
00113 {
00114     debitValue->setText("<tt>" + journalData->journalTmpDebit() + "</tt>");
00115     creditValue->setText("<tt>" + journalData->journalTmpCredit() + "</tt>");
00116     balanceValue->setText("<b><tt>" + journalData->journalTmpBalance() + "</tt></b>");
00117 }
